title: 099: Why Ayurveda is The Next Big Thing with Sahara Rose
itunes:title: 099: Why Ayurveda is The Next Big Thing
description:
Ayurveda is going to soon be as popular yoga (mark my words.) In this episode, I discuss WHY becoming an Ayurvedic Practitioner has been so life-changing for me and how you can know if it's right for you.

Receive up to $2250 off tuition off my alma mater Institute for Integrative Nutrition, plus my How To Create a Thriving Business Coach Webinar and other exclusive bonuses by signing up and listing my name as your referral! Launch your new career today: integrativenutrition.com/sahara

They offer two programs: the Masters of Digestion, which focuses on all of the digestive issues from IBS, Crohn’s, candida, leaky gut, et cetera from an Ayurvedic perspective. This is an incredible program if you’re very interested in digestion and want to have a practice helping people with theirs, inclusive of the gut-brain connection, as our mood is a reflection of our digestive health.

Within 1 year, you will be a Certified Ayurvedic Digestion coach and can create your own practices, work with doctors or in wellness centers globally. Digestion is such a hot-topic right now and very few people know about it’s true roots from an Ayurvedic perspective.

The other is their two-year program Fundamentals of Natural Healing Ayurvedic Counselor Program, which trains you to become a Certified Ayurvedic Practitioner (as I am) and work with a wide-range of clients, from nutrition to pregnancy to self-care, or begin your own wellness center!

Within 2 years, you’ll be able to work with any type of client, from those seeking to lose weight, balance anxiety, heal gut issues, address skin problems or launch your own Ayurvedic center, which is SO in demand right now.

As a free gift for all who sign up for Joyful Belly through me, I am additionally offering an exclusive webinar “How To Create a Thriving Business as an Ayurvedic Practitioner” where I teach you how to teach Ayurveda in a world where most have not heard of it, the types of businesses you can create with an Ayurvedic background such as launching your own tea or supplement company, creating a retreat center, online programs and more.

I am also offering an exclusive private Facebook support community where you can connect with other future Ayurvedic practitioners in the tribe.

Click here to learn more and get my bonuses: http://integrativenutrition.com/sahara

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose
